catagories.name: Convert Goods
catagories.description: Games where players convert raw materials or goods into other forms for progression.

catagories.name: Dad Jokes
catagories.description: Games centered around humorous and corny one-liners or jokes.

catagories.name: Get Rich
catagories.description: Games focused on accumulating wealth and resources through strategic decisions.

catagories.name: Roll/Flip and Write
catagories.description: Games where players roll dice or flip cards and write down results to achieve objectives.

catagories.name: Scheming
catagories.description: Games that involve plotting and strategy, often with elements of deception.

catagories.name: Supply Chain
catagories.description: Games where players manage supply chains and resources to meet demands.

catagories.name: Tile Placement
catagories.description: Games where players strategically place tiles to build areas or achieve objectives.

games.name: Catan
games.description: A resource trading game where players compete to build settlements and cities on an island.

games.name: Ticket to Ride
games.description: A cross-country train adventure where players collect cards to claim railway routes.

games.name: Pandemic
games.description: A cooperative game where players work together to stop global disease outbreaks.

games.name: Carcassonne
games.description: A tile-placement game where players build a medieval landscape with cities, roads, and fields.

games.name: Dominion
games.description: A deck-building game where players compete to build the most efficient deck.

games.name: 7 Wonders
games.description: A card-drafting game where players build ancient civilizations over three ages.

games.name: Azul
games.description: A tile-drafting game where players create beautiful patterns using Portuguese tiles.

games.name: Terraforming Mars
games.description: Players control corporations and compete to make Mars habitable through resource management and card play.

games.name: Codenames
games.description: A word association game where teams compete to guess the correct codenames based on clues.

games.name: Wingspan
games.description: A bird-collecting engine-building game where players attract birds to their wildlife preserves.

games.name: Splendor
games.description: A card-based resource management game where players collect gems to build prestige.

games.name: Root
games.description: An asymmetric war game where woodland creatures vie for control of a forest.

games.name: Gloomhaven
games.description: A cooperative, tactical combat game with legacy elements where players explore a dark world.

games.name: King of Tokyo
games.description: A dice-rolling game where players battle to become the King of Tokyo.

games.name: Patchwork
games.description: A two-player game where players compete to create the best quilt using patches of fabric.

games.name: The Crew
games.description: A cooperative trick-taking game where players complete space missions.

games.name: Mysterium
games.description: A cooperative game where one player is a ghost giving clues to solve a murder mystery.

games.name: Scythe
games.description: A strategy game set in an alternate-history 1920s period where players control factions vying for dominance.

games.name: Agricola
games.description: A farming simulation game where players manage resources to build and expand their farms.

games.name: Everdell
games.description: A worker placement game where players build a city within the charming world of Everdell.

games.name: Spirit Island
games.description: A cooperative game where players take on the roles of spirits defending their island from colonizers.

games.name: Viticulture
games.description: A worker placement game where players manage a vineyard to produce the best wines.

games.name: Brass: Birmingham
games.description: An economic strategy game where players build industries and networks in the Industrial Revolution.

games.name: Clank!
games.description: A deck-building adventure game where players explore a dungeon to steal artifacts without making too much noise.

games.name: Tzolk'in: The Mayan Calendar
games.description: A worker placement game with rotating gears representing the Mayan calendar.

games.name: Blood Rage
games.description: A Viking-themed strategy game where players control clans vying for glory before Ragnarok.

games.name: The Quacks of Quedlinburg
games.description: A push-your-luck game where players brew potions by drawing ingredients from a bag.

games.name: Great Western Trail
games.description: A strategy game where players manage cattle herds and deliver them to Kansas City.

games.name: Concordia
games.description: A strategy game where players build trade networks in the Roman Empire.

games.name: Architects of the West Kingdom
games.description: A worker placement game where players build structures and hire apprentices in the Carolingian Empire.

games.name: Raiders of the North Sea
games.description: A worker placement game where players assemble a crew and raid settlements for resources.

games.name: Paladins of the West Kingdom
games.description: A worker placement game where players gather workers to defend against enemies and build fortifications.

games.name: Underwater Cities
games.description: A strategy game where players build underwater metropolises to sustain human life.

games.name: Teotihuacan: City of Gods
games.description: A strategy game where players build and develop the ancient city of Teotihuacan.

games.name: On Mars
games.description: A strategy game where players colonize Mars by constructing buildings and managing resources.

games.name: Anachrony
games.description: A strategy game where players use time travel to gather resources and avert a future catastrophe.

games.name: Lisboa
games.description: A strategy game where players rebuild the city of Lisbon after the 1755 earthquake.

games.name: Gaia Project
games.description: A strategy game where players terraform planets and expand their civilizations in space.

games.name: Maracaibo
games.description: A strategy game where players explore the Caribbean, trade goods, and complete quests.

games.name: Tapestry
games.description: A civilization-building game where players develop their societies from the dawn of time to the future.

games.name: A Feast for Odin
games.description: A worker placement game where players lead Viking tribes to explore, trade, and raid.

games.name: Twilight Imperium
games.description: A grand strategy game where players control galactic civilizations vying for dominance.

games.name: Through the Ages
games.description: A civilization-building game where players guide their societies from antiquity to the modern age.

games.name: Mage Knight
games.description: A deck-building adventure game where players explore a fantasy world and complete quests.

games.name: Eclipse
games.description: A space exploration and combat game where players expand their civilizations and engage in epic battles.
